name: chrome-extension-shimo-export
description: 从石墨文档全量导出文件到本地，多类型导出格式md、docx、pdf、jpg。文件夹层级保留

scripts.build:chrome: npm run build:base && mkdir -p dist/chrome && cp -r .build-temp/* dist/chrome/ && cp manifest/manifest-chrome.json dist/chrome/manifest.json
scripts.build:firefox: npm run build:base && mkdir -p dist/firefox && cp -r .build-temp/* dist/firefox/ && cp manifest/manifest-firefox.json dist/firefox/manifest.json
scripts.build:edge: npm run build:base && mkdir -p dist/edge && cp -r .build-temp/* dist/edge/ && cp manifest/manifest-edge.json dist/edge/manifest.json
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build:base && mkdir -p dist/chrome dist/firefox dist/edge && cp -r .build-temp/* dist/chrome/ && cp manifest/manifest-chrome.json dist/chrome/manifest.json && cp -r .build-temp/* dist/firefox/ && cp manifest/manifest-firefox.json dist/firefox/manifest.json && cp -r .build-temp/* dist/edge/ && cp manifest/manifest-edge.json dist/edge/manifest.json && rm -rf .build-temp
scripts.pack:all: npm run build:all && npm run pack:chrome && npm run pack:firefox && npm run pack:edge
